PERSONA:
meet sarah, a 35-year-old married woman living in a non-metropolitan area in the mountain region of the western united states. she is a white non-hispanic american who was born and raised in the country.

sarah has some college education but did not obtain a degree. she is a devout member of the church of jesus christ of latter-day saints (mormon) and attends religious services once a week. her religious beliefs and values shape her conservative political ideology, and she is a registered republican voter.

coming from a lower-income household, with an annual family income between $30,000 and $40,000, sarah leads a modest lifestyle. despite her financial constraints, she remains actively engaged with the world, using the internet several times a day to stay informed and connected.

while sarah may not have the means to contribute financially to charitable causes, she finds fulfillment in her role as a wife and her involvement in her local church community. her life revolves around her family, her faith, and her traditional values, which guide her decisions and shape her worldview.
